triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a lemma for achieving predefined-time stability within the backstepping framework.

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Neural networks are used as part of the adaptive approach to predefined-time tracking control.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: Control theory provides the theoretical foundation for the tracking control methods developed.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses tracking control for multiagent systems where followers track desired trajectories.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: Nonlinear control techniques are applied to handle the nonlinear dynamics of the multiagent systems.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an adaptive control approach that adjusts to system parameters for predefined-time tracking.

triples.name: Platoon (automobile)
triples.relevance: Vehicular platoon control is mentioned as a practical application of the proposed predefined-time control method.

triples.name: Teleoperation
triples.relevance: Teleoperation systems control is mentioned as another practical application domain for the proposed method.
